var lineCount=50;var lines=[];var lineGeometries=[];var lineMaterials=[];for(var i=0;i<lineCount;i++){// Create curved line geometry
var points=[];var segments=50+Math.floor(Math.random()*30);// Generate organic, flowing curve

var material=new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({color:new THREE.Color().setHSL(0.12+Math.random()*0.05,0.8,0.6+Math.random()*0.3),// Gold to amber

var handleMouseMove=function handleMouseMove(event){mouseRef.current.x=event.clientX/window.innerWidth*2-1;mouseRef.current.y=-(event.clientY/window.innerHeight)*2+1;};window.addEventListener('mousemove',handleMouseMove);// Add to DOM

var animate=function animate(){animationIdRef.current=requestAnimationFrame(animate);if(linesRef.current){// Animate each line with flowing motion

line.position.x+=Math.sin(Date.now()*0.001+index)*0.01;line.position.y+=Math.cos(Date.now()*0.001+index)*0.008;line.position.z+=Math.sin(Date.now()*0.001+index*0.5)*0.005;// Keep lines within bounds
